workout_groups.name: Beginner Lower Body Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: Basic lower body exercises to build strength, stability, and endurance.

workouts.name: Bodyweight Squats
workouts.description: Perform controlled squats focusing on full range of motion.

workouts.name: Glute Bridge
workouts.description: Engage the glutes and hamstrings by lifting your hips off the ground.

workouts.name: Step-Ups
workouts.description: Step onto a sturdy platform, alternating legs.

workouts.name: Calf Raises
workouts.description: Rise onto your toes, holding at the top for a second before lowering.

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description: Step forward and lower into a lunge while keeping your knee behind your toes.

workout_groups.name: Intermediate Lower Body Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: A balanced lower body workout focusing on strength and hypertrophy.

workouts.name: Goblet Squats
workouts.description: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level while squatting.

workouts.name: Deadlifts
workouts.description: Lift a barbell from the ground to hip level, focusing on form.

workouts.name: Leg Curls
workouts.description: Use a leg curl machine to target the hamstrings.

workouts.name: Leg Extensions
workouts.description: Use a leg extension machine to target the quadriceps.

workouts.name: Walking Lunges
workouts.description: Perform lunges while walking forward, alternating legs.

workout_groups.name: Strength & Hypertrophy Lower Body Routine
workout_groups.description: A muscle-growth-focused leg workout using moderate weights and higher reps.

workouts.name: Barbell Squats
workouts.description: Perform squats with a barbell, focusing on depth and control.

workouts.name: Romanian Deadlifts
workouts.description: Maintain a slight bend in the knees while hinging at the hips to target the hamstrings.

workouts.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
workouts.description: Elevate one foot behind you and perform deep lunges to engage the quads and glutes.

workouts.name: Seated Calf Raises
workouts.description: Perform calf raises while seated to emphasize the soleus muscle.

workouts.name: Leg Press
workouts.description: Push the sled with control, avoiding full knee lockout at the top.

workout_groups.name: Explosive Power & Speed Routine
workout_groups.description: Exercises to develop speed, jumping ability, and explosive power.

workouts.name: Box Jumps
workouts.description: Jump onto a box with full power, landing softly.

workouts.name: Depth Jumps
workouts.description: Step off a box and immediately explode into a jump.

workouts.name: Speed Skater Lunges
workouts.description: Jump laterally from one foot to the other in a controlled manner.

workouts.name: Broad Jumps
workouts.description: Jump forward as far as possible with controlled landings.

workouts.name: Sled Push
workouts.description: Push a weighted sled as fast as possible to develop lower body explosiveness.

workout_groups.name: Functional & Athletic Lower Body Routine
workout_groups.description: A lower body workout that improves balance, stability, and functional strength.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Deadlifts
workouts.description: Balance on one leg while hinging at the hips, maintaining control.

workouts.name: Step-Through Lunges
workouts.description: Lunge forward and backward in one smooth motion.

workouts.name: Cossack Squats
workouts.description: Shift weight side to side in a deep lateral squat.

workouts.name: Banded Lateral Walks
workouts.description: Use a resistance band around the legs to strengthen the glutes and hip stabilizers.

workouts.name: Pistol Squats
workouts.description: Lower into a deep squat on one leg while keeping the other extended forward.

workout_groups.name: Super Lower Body Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: Advanced strength and hypertrophy workout designed for elite lifters and athletes.

workouts.name: Front Squats
workouts.description: Hold the barbell in front rack position to challenge posture and core engagement.

workouts.name: Nordic Hamstring Curls
workouts.description: Lower yourself slowly with controlled eccentric movement.
